title: David and Jonathan, Saul’s Jealousy
summary: David becomes a hero, forming a deep friendship with Saul’s son Jonathan. However, Saul grows jealous of David’s popularity and tries to kill him. David continues to succeed and earn the people's favor.

faq.question: How did Jonathan feel about David?
faq.answer: He loved him as a close friend and made a covenant with him.

faq.question: Why did Saul become jealous?
faq.answer: Because people praised David more than Saul after Goliath’s defeat.
